name: 4.7.0-beta.0
releaseNotes:
- Sign in your SPlayer account to get access to more features and functions
- Upgrade to SPlayer Premium and get an exclusive experience
- Added support for exporting subtitles and translation results to SRT files
- Added support more languages for Speech-to-text and AI Translation (Beta): 日本語, 한국어, Español, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Português, čeština, Русский, Indonesian, العربية, Türkçe, română
- Added a new landing page in the Browser Mode
- Added support for creating customized sites in the Browser Mode
- Added support for generating 3×3 and 4×4 video thumbnails
- Added support for copying site address in the Browser Mode
- Fixed a bug where the subtitle font settings would be reset after restarting
- Fixed a bug where the number keypad was not working
<!---->
- 全新账户系统以使用户登录后使用更多功能和特性
- 正式推出射手云养员计划，给射手投食并获得独享权益
- 支持将 AI 翻译和字幕导出为 SRT 文件
- 支持更多小语种语音识别和智能翻译 (Beta): 日本語, 한국어, Español, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Português, čeština, Русский, Indonesian, العربية, Türkçe, română
- 新增浏览器模式首页
- 浏览器模式允许添加自定义站点
- 新增 3×3 和 4×4 缩略图生成功能
- 浏览器模式支持复制站点的链接地址
- 修复字幕大小设置在重启后失效的问题
- 修复小键盘无法输入的问题
